projects.title: Physics-Informed Deep Variance Stabilization with Diffusion Denoising for Non-Stationary Rician Noise in MRI (Ongoing)
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a physics-informed denoising framework for MRI corrupted by non-stationary Rician noise.
- Combines Sigma-Net + VST-Net for deep variance stabilization with a diffusion-based denoiser, achieving an initial PSNR of 24.6 dB while preserving anatomical structures.

projects.title: Data Augmentation for Class Imbalance in Thermal Imaging
projects.bodyText:
- Designed a diffusion-based data augmentation pipeline to address class imbalance in thermal imaging datasets.
- Utilized a U-Net with self-attention, positional encoding, and a cosine noise schedule to generate synthetic samples and improve ViT classifier performance.

projects.title: Hybrid Deep Learning Framework for Lung Segmentation and COVID-19 Detection (Ongoing)
projects.bodyText:
- Built a hybrid framework using U-Net for lung segmentation from chest X-rays, achieving Dice scores up to 96%.
- Implemented Vision Transformers for multi-class classification of COVID-19, Lung Opacity, and Viral Pneumonia with average accuracy up to 95%.

projects.title: Pavement Crack Detection using Deep Learning
projects.bodyText:
- Applied semantic segmentation (U-Net with ResNet-34 encoder and SegNet with VGG-13) for automated pavement crack detection.
- U-Net achieved 96% accuracy on the Crack500 dataset, outperforming SegNet (95%) by better preserving spatial details.

projects.title: Anomaly Detection using Variational Autoencoder and Unsupervised Clustering
projects.bodyText:
- Trained a Variational Autoencoder on thermal image data and performed clustering in the latent space.
- Achieved ~95% accuracy for unsupervised anomaly detection using K-means and Gaussian Mixture Models on learned embeddings.

projects.title: CAD Design for Additive Manufacturing
projects.bodyText:
- Investigated infill and structural design for FDM-fabricated parts to reduce material usage while maintaining mechanical performance.
- Conducted compressive, ductility, and three-point bending tests to study stress–ductility/load–weight trade-offs across different infill patterns.

projects.title: Hospital Management Systems Database
projects.bodyText:
- Designed and implemented an SQLite database to manage patient records, doctor schedules, appointments, billing, and inventory.
- Generated realistic synthetic data using Python and Faker and enabled analytical queries for hospital resource and workflow optimization.
